titleStmt.title: News from France in a letter giving a relation of the present state of the difference between the French king and the court of Rome : to which is added the Popes brief to the assembly of the clergy, and the protestation made by them in Latin : together with an English translation of them.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

titleStmt.title: News from France in a letter giving a relation of the present state of the difference between the French king and the court of Rome : to which is added the Popes brief to the assembly of the clergy, and the protestation made by them in Latin : together with an English translation of them.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
Innocent XI, Pope, 1611-1689. Ad archiepiscopos, episcopos, totumque clerum in regno Galliae. English & Latin.
Fall, James, 1646 or 7-1711.
Catholic Church. Assemblée générale du clergé de France. Cleri Gallicani de ecclesiastica potestate declaratio. English & Latin.

notesStmt.note: Probably a revision of a letter from James Fall. Cf. Clarke, T.E.S. A life of Gilbert Burnet, 1907, p. 529.
Written by Gilbert Burnet. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
